snippet.title: Carpoon Trailer - Parking Has Changed (Wishlist on Steam!)
snippet.description:
Add to your Steam wishlist:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1068840/Carpoon/

Try the demo! https://tombo.itch.io/carpoon
Trailer by Brandon Miracle https://twitter.com/BabaBaabs
Clutch music by Mathew Kirkegaard https://twitter.com/PeachToadstoolP

What happens when you fuse a harpoon gun to a tow truck? Twin-stick car harpooning action! Harpoon and reel cars in, then tow them into the recycling crusher before time runs out.

For one to four players, get the most points in a versus match to win - even if it means recycling your friends and harpooning through their ropes. Or fend off foes from your extra lives in stock taker mode and be the last truck driving.

Not feeling like beating up your buddies? Play together in co-op while towing off waves of potential parking perpetrators. 

Each stage features different environments and challenges to be aware of, from crumbling statues in Parkin’ Panic, to volcanic eruptions and homing lasers on tropical Volcarnage Island. Customize match time and stock along with different modes for tons of ways to hook up!
